author: _es0_
content: Hi everyone, I'm interested in resources related to hashing power and the geographic distribution of hashing. I'm involved in the project carbon.fyi (an attempt to quantify potential GHG emissions from the computational resources spent on the ETH network), and being able to better attribute hashing power to different power grids would greatly improve our model.

author: _es0_
content: I'm happy to discuss this further with anyone who is interested and appreciate your insights!
